title: Browns and Chargers light up scoreboard, Bills revenge win over Chiefs, Barkley and Burrow Injury Updates, Week 5 Game Balls
itunes:title: Browns and Chargers light up scoreboard, Bills revenge win over Chiefs, Barkley and Burrow Injury Updates, Week 5 Game Balls
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and DeAngelo Hall explain why the Chiefs are no longer the front running team in the AFC while Browns-Chargers could've been the game of the year. Over in the NFC, the Cardinals and Cowboys continue to stake their claims as the best teams in the Conference. Tom Brady should always get a Game Ball, but Josh Allen and Austin Ekeler stepped up this week. We also get injury updates on Saquon Barkley and Joe Burrow looking ahead to Week 6.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
